page.title: 03Choirs in Rhos
page.content: There are three main choir in Rhos.The Girls Choir,The Rhos Orpheus Choir and the Rhos Male Voice.There are other choirs like the pensioners choir and school choirs and a few years ago church choirs. The conductor of the Rhos Girls Choir iss Eifion Wyn Jones and accopanit.The conductor has been with the choir for twenty three and a half years.Ruth has been with the for three months.The age limits are eleven upwards.There is a tour to the USA in August.There is one concert planned,so far,on the tour.Their uniform is a red blouse and navy blue skirt. The conductor of the Orpheus Choir is John Glyn Williams and their accompanist is Anne Phillips for nineteen years and the accompanist has been with them for seventeen years.
